full_text:
Page 41
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 16:52:21 +0000

Hi, I know you are busy. Following up on this. Also wondering about a few details I see out there:

was this already known? In addition, the jail had transferred his cellmate and allowed Mr. Epstein to be housed alone in a cell just two weeks after he had been taken off suicide watch, a decision that also violated the jail's normal procedure, two officials said.

â€”
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-25 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:17:52 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Thanks (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
1. When was Epstein taken off suicide watch?
2. How long was he on suicide watch?
3. What unit in the jail was he housed?
4. Was he by himself?
5. What's protocol for watching him at 6:30 in the morning? And in general during a 24 hour period?
6. Is there an internal investigation? Are the guard(s) and/or supervisors placed on modified duty/or some sort of restricted duty while there is an ongoing investigation?
7. Are there surveillance cameras? If so what do they show?
8. What did he use to hang himself?

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:10:00 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon,

I you may understand with the ongoing events please understand that time is very limited. Please submit any questions you may have and I will respond as best and as soon as I am able to.

Thank you

>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com 8/10/2019 2:30 PM >>>
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

Can you give me a call when you have a moment. Thanks. 267-257 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

DOJ-OGR-00024684

text_blocks.content:
Page 41
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 16:52:21 +0000

Hi, I know you are busy. Following up on this. Also wondering about a few details I see out there:

was this already known? In addition, the jail had transferred his cellmate and allowed Mr. Epstein to be housed alone in a cell just two weeks after he had been taken off suicide watch, a decision that also violated the jail's normal procedure, two officials said.

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-25 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:17:52 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Thanks (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
1. When was Epstein taken off suicide watch?
2. How long was he on suicide watch?
3. What unit in the jail was he housed?
4. Was he by himself?
5. What's protocol for watching him at 6:30 in the morning? And in general during a 24 hour period?
6. Is there an internal investigation? Are the guard(s) and/or supervisors placed on modified duty/or some sort of restricted duty while there is an ongoing investigation?
7. Are there surveillance cameras? If so what do they show?
8. What did he use to hang himself?

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:10:00 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon,

I you may understand with the ongoing events please understand that time is very limited. Please submit any questions you may have and I will respond as best and as soon as I am able to.

Thank you

>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com 8/10/2019 2:30 PM >>>
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

Can you give me a call when you have a moment. Thanks. 267-257 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain between a Senior Editor from The Daily Beast and an official from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death. The emails contain questions and information about Epstein's suicide watch and the circumstances surrounding his death. The document has been redacted to remove personal identifying information.
